review_blob: The aroma was good, appearance was dark and looked like chocolate. I loved the taste and was very easy to drink, palate had a good taste of slight coffee and chocolate, and I was very surprised that this was one of my favorite beers to drink. I would try it again.
Good thick body, but the after taste has a strong bitterness that hides the weak blueberry taste. I am open to frying a non flavored brew.
